E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Rondell White
Dear Sir,
Rondell White has nothing more to prove at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
He has an AVG of .430 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Friday, 6/27/1991
Subject: Mike Mason injured
Hello Manager,
he had a little fight in a bar, and got knocked out.
Diagnosis: Broken Nose.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor
